description: Can reload a extension under wayland without having to restart the shell, and show errors due to Gnome allowing the installation of old extensions. Would be nice if could use to open extension settings and/or remove them without having to use the existing system sub-sub-menu's, but otherwise its nice and simple.

SE: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64 bits

Fonctionne parfaitement ! (mais n'a aucun effet sous WAYLAND je crois)
